title: Smouldering Fire
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate-cover edition for ISBN 9780030013119, found here From the cover: "D.E. Stevenson has here produced one of the best novels with a Highland setting which has appeared for many a day. The reader is made sensible of the charm and mystery of the Highlands on the first page and the glamour remains to the end..." So wrote The Scotsman of Edinburgh when this novel was first published. In Smouldering Fire, we find a rare combination of love, mystery, and humor.
author: D.E. Stevenson
